hedline.hl1: Suzuki Expands Ties To Colby Effler

abstract.p: American Suzuki Motor Corp, Brea, Calif, says it will expand its relationship with Colby Effler & Partners, Santa Monica, Calif, by awarding the agency the Suzuki automotive account; billings are estimated at $33 million (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: The American Suzuki Motor Corporation in Brea, Calif., said yesterday that it would expand its relationship with Colby Effler & Partners in Santa Monica, Calif., part of Dentsu Inc., by awarding the agency the Suzuki automotive account.
That assignment, with billings estimated at $33 million, had been handled for 11 years by Asher & Partners in Los Angeles.

The American Suzuki Motor Corporation in Brea, Calif., said yesterday that it would expand its relationship with Colby Effler & Partners in Santa Monica, Calif., part of Dentsu Inc., by awarding the agency the Suzuki automotive account.
That assignment, with billings estimated at $33 million, had been handled for 11 years by Asher & Partners in Los Angeles.
Colby Effler has created American campaigns for Suzuki motorcycles and all-terrain vehicles for 15 years.
In Japan, Dentsu handles Suzuki automotive advertising. This becomes the first American car account for a Dentsu agency.
The initial American automotive assignment for Colby Effler will be to help introduce the Suzuki XL-7, a sport utility vehicle.
The dismissal of Asher and the shift of the automotive account to Colby Effler were made without a review.
The changes came after the appointment of new executives at American Suzuki.
